org.soulwing.prospecto.runtime.text

Class AbstractViewWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.soulwing.prospecto.runtime.text.AbstractViewWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewWriter

    public abstract class AbstractViewWriter
extends Object
implements ViewWriter
    An object that produces a textual representation of a View on an OutputStream.

    This class is designed to allow a callback-driven interpretation of a view's event stream.

    A writer is not thread safe.

    Author:
    Carl Harris

    • Method Detail

      • getOptions

        public Options getOptions()

      • writeView

        public final void writeView()
                     throws ViewException
        Writes the view to the target output stream.

        The underlying output stream is not closed by this method.

        Specified by:
        writeView in interface ViewWriter
        Throws:
        ViewException - if an error occurs in writing the view.
        IllegalStateException - if this method has already been invoked on this writer instance
